entry.title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: Secret health facility exclusive for Chinese discovered in Parañaque

media:group.media:title: GMA NEWS COVID-19 Bulletin: Secret health facility exclusive for Chinese discovered in Parañaque
media:group.media:description:
The local government of Parañaque discovered an illegal health facility exclusive for Chinese nationals where unregistered medicines for coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and sexually transmitted diseases were also found.
